subject: Automobile Racing
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: Graham Rahal, the 19-year-old son of the 1986 Indianapolis 500 winner, Bobby Rahal, took the checkered flag in his first IndyCar start last Sunday.
snippet: Graham Rahal, the 19-year-old son of the 1986 Indianapolis 500 winner, Bobby Rahal, took the checkered flag in his first IndyCar start last Sunday.
